title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Rectangle filled with diamonds- points touching. Full face flowers in center of each diamond and profile-view flowers on four sides of each diamond. Hand painted in brown, purple, burgundy, rose, grey-green on light and dark rust background.
